item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 14 Feb 2023
item.description:
1. Could merlin be compiled with js_of_ocaml and work in the browser
  2. Opine 0.1.0 - Python source code transformations in OCaml
  3. Paul Biggar on Darklang
  4. Seppo.Social v0.1 and Request for Comments
  5. List your open OCaml positions on the OCaml.org job board
  6. Available for Hire - Q1 2023
  7. Timedesc 1.0.0 - modern date time handling
  8. Major updates to kcas in 0.1.8 and 0.2.0
